## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G31420](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G31420)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>REIL1</u>
- **Gene Name:** REI1-LIKE 1
- **Description:**   Zinc finger protein 622;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [reil1-1 reil2-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Photoautotrophic cultivation without sucrose caused slow growth and generated early flowering, dwarfed plants with small root systems. Delayed accumulation of the 60S LSU fraction.
